content: immerse yourself in the joy of crocheting with the bubble pop dishcloth pattern this easy-level project is perfect for beginners and seasoned crocheters alike the pattern includes written instructions textured bobble stitches and a video tutorial for visual learners crafted with herrschners cottage cotton yarn this dishcloth is both durable and soft making it ideal for everyday use the bobble stitch creates a fun and playful texture that adds a touch of whimsy to your kitchen **unique features-** easy-level pattern perfect for all skill levels includes written instructions and video tutorial textured bobble stitch adds playful dimension ideal for everyday use in the kitchen **materials needed-** hook 5mm us size 8 0 yarn **herrschner s cottage cotton** https //tidd ly/46vcjyq dk / sport weight 130-135 yards
